page.title: 05EMILY'S DAY IN WILLOUGHBY
page.content: A typical Thursday for me would be to wake up 7.45.a.m, to actually get out of bed at 8.00.a.m. and then have my breakfast of cocoa pops at 8.15.a.m. After I'd brushed my teeth and hair and washed I would go and call for Charlie.Then I would wait at Charlie's until school starts. We always go to school at quarter to nine but school starts at 9.oo.a.m. When we get to school we wait until 9.00.a.m. then we usually read for about quarter of an hour. After that we have something like handwriting and then television at 9.30.a.m. Our television at the moment is about "The Night Swimmers" by Betsy Byars. Then for about twenty minutes we'd do something like maths. At 10.30.a.m. we have play . We'd probably play Port and Starboard; it's a really good game. Then when we come in we do a bit more maths.
